mapper.select: select inn_name,book_checkin, book_checkout, inn_price, member_id, master,inn_no from (select to_char(b.book_checkin,'YYYY-MM-DD') as book_checkin, to_char(b.book_checkout,'YYYY-MM-DD') as book_checkout, b.member_id, i.inn_price, i.member_id as master, i.inn_no, i.inn_name from book b, inn i where b.inn_no=i.inn_no ) where book_checkout < sysdate
mapper.insert: insert into Trade (Trade_no, inn_name, book_checkin, book_checkout, inn_price,member_id,master,inn_no,rating_check) values(trade_sequence.nextval,#{innName},#{bookCheckIn},#{bookCheckOut},#{price},#{memberId},#{master},#{innNo},'N')
mapper.delete: delete from book where book_checkout < sysdate
